title: Should She Confront Her Boyfriend Over What She Found In His Drawer?
description:
They've been together for over five years, and she thought she knew all she needed to know about her boyfriend. However, when she was cleaning up their place, she discovered something strange in his drawer. 
It was a bottle of pill that he used to enhance his performance in the bedroom. Now she has a ton of questions. Should she confront him or not?
